title: Build newList from oldList - write code

content.question: Which of the following can replace /* missing code */ to produce this result?

choices.label: for (String s : oldList) { newList.add(s); newList.add(0, s); }
for (int j = 0; j < oldList.size(); j++) { newList.add(oldList.get(0)); newList.add(oldList.get(j)); }
for (int j = 0; j < oldList.size(); j++) { newList.add(j, oldList.get(j)); newList.add(0, oldList.get(j)); }

content.answer: for (String s : oldList) { newList.add(s); newList.add(0, s); }

skill.text: 2.B: Write program code involving data abstractions.
